channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat, Inc. -- JBoss
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat, Inc. -- JBoss

item.title: CVE-2017-7504|2024-08-05T16:04:11.874Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- jboss
item.description: HTTPServerILServlet.java in JMS over HTTP Invocation Layer of the JbossMQ implementation, which is enabled by default in Red Hat Jboss Application Server <= Jboss 4.X does not restrict the classes for which it performs deserialization, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted serialized data.
